name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Singapore Random NRIC and FIN Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension generates random NRIC and FIN (Singapore) for testing purposes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The NRIC/FIN Generator is a Chrome extension designed to assist developers and testers in generating random Singapore NRIC and FIN numbers for testing purposes. This tool allows you to easily generate valid IDs based on specified prefixes and year ranges, ensuring that your testing scenarios are comprehensive and realistic.

★ Key Features ★

✔ Generate Random NRIC/FIN Numbers: Quickly generate valid NRIC and FIN numbers for testing purposes.
✔ Default All Types Generation: When opened, the extension will generate all types of IDs by default, providing a comprehensive range of NRIC and FIN numbers for testing.
✔ Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy generated IDs to your clipboard for quick use in your testing environments.
✔ Customizable Prefixes: Select from NRIC prefixes (S, T) and FIN prefixes (F, G, M) to generate specific types of IDs.
✔ Year Range Selection: Choose from predefined year ranges (Before 2000, 2000-2021, 2022-Present) to match different ID issuance periods.
✔ Multiple Outputs: Generate multiple IDs at once for extensive testing.
✔ User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for effortless ID generation.
